title: United States - lasting of love in a relationship in 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly positive which exists from 2_to_5_years to A_lifetime.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely negative which exists from Less_than_two_years to 2_to_5_years.
gold: This statistic shows the results of a survey conducted in the United States in 2019 on how long the respondents thought the feeling of love could last in a relationship . According to 77 percent of respondents , the feeling of love in a relationship can last a lifetime .
